name: gccsa_g14_religious_affiliation_by_sex_census_2016
title: GCCSA-G14 Religious Affiliation by Sex-Census 2016

legal.licenceType: Creative Commons Attribution 2.5 Australia (CC BY 2.5 AU)

abstract:
GCCSA based data for Religious Affiliation by Sex, in General Community Profile (GCP), 2016 Census. Count of persons. The data is by GCCSA 2016 boundaries. Periodicity: 5-Yearly.
Note: There are small random adjustments made to all cell values to protect the confidentiality of data. These adjustments may cause the sum of rows or columns to differ by small amounts from table totals.
For more information visit the data source: http://www.abs.gov.au/census.

selectedAttributes.title: Other Religions Australian Aboriginal Traditional Religions Persons
selectedAttributes.description: Other Religions Australian Aboriginal Traditional Religions Persons.

selectedAttributes.name: othr_reln_other_reln_groups_p
selectedAttributes.title: Other Religions Other religious groups Persons
selectedAttributes.description: Other Religions Other religious groups Persons. Other religions comprises 'Baha'i', 'Chinese Religions', 'Druse', 'Japanese Religions', 'Nature Religions', 'Spiritualism' and 'Miscellaneous Religions'.

selectedAttributes.name: religious_affiliation_ns_p
selectedAttributes.title: Religious affiliation Not Stated or Inadequately Described Persons
selectedAttributes.description: Religious affiliation Not Stated or Inadequately Described Persons.

selectedAttributes.name: sb_osb_nra_nr_p
selectedAttributes.title: Secular Beliefs and Other Spiritual Beliefs and No Religious Affiliation No Religion So Described Persons
selectedAttributes.description: Secular Beliefs and Other Spiritual Beliefs and No Religious Affiliation No Religion So Described Persons. In 2016 the order of the response categories changed on the Census form, no religion moved to the first response. This may result in higher responses reported for the 'No Religion, so described' category.

selectedAttributes.description: Secular Beliefs and Other Spiritual Beliefs and No Religious Affiliation Secular Beliefs Persons. 'Secular Beliefs' includes 'Secular Beliefs, nfd', 'Agnosticism', 'Atheism', 'Humanism', 'Rationalism' and 'Secular Beliefs, nec'.
